courses.who_for: VA drivers court-ordered, DMV-assigned, or voluntary (to gain safe points or insurance discount).
requirements: 8-hour DMV-approved clinic (online or classroom; under 20 must take in-person)
DMV usually requires within 90 days of notice

submission.certificate: DIC 552 Certificate issued; submit to court if required, otherwise provider reports to DMV
submission.reporting: Providers update DMV electronically within 24 hours

court_vs_insurance.court: Used for traffic cases or license reinstatement.
court_vs_insurance.insurance: Insurance discounts available (especially for 55+), but cannot combine with safe points.
